title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in a large pot of salted boiling water until al dente.
Meanwhile, heat a pan over medium heat and add the pancetta, cooking until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk together the eggs, pecorino cheese, and a generous amount of black pepper.
Once the pasta is cooked, reserve some pasta water, then drain the spaghetti.
Add the hot pasta to the pan with the pancetta, remove from heat, and quickly mix in the egg mixture, adding reserved pasta water as needed to create a creamy sauce.
Serve immediately, topped with extra cheese and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
